Class Ballot

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ballot

  • public class Ballot
extends java.lang.Object
    Ballot is a class that holds a class that holds an election ballot information. A ballot is held in an array. Each element is a rank of a candidate in the IR election.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int curRound
      Record current round of the election for this Ballot
      private int id
      Identifies a ballot uniquely.
      private int[] votes
      The array containing ranking/voting information of a ballot.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ballot(int id, int leng)
      Constructor for a ballot which we don't know the ballot information right away.
      Ballot(int id, int[] votes)
      Ballot constructor.
      Ballot(int id, java.lang.String[] votes_string)
      Since the ballot information is in String format after processing, this constructor was added for conversion convenience to convert a string ballot to an int ballot.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCurRound() 
      int getId() 
      int[] getVotes() 
      void setCurRound(int curRound)
      Updates the Ballot to the current round of the instant runoff election.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ballot

        public Ballot(int id,
              int leng)
        Constructor for a ballot which we don't know the ballot information right away.
        Parameters:
        id: - The unique identifier for the Ballot
        leng - The size of the array to store the ballot

      • Ballot

        public Ballot(int id,
              int[] votes)
        Ballot constructor.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique identifier for the Ballot
        votes - The size of the array to store the ballot

      • Ballot

        public Ballot(int id,
              java.lang.String[] votes_string)
        Since the ballot information is in String format after processing, this constructor was added for conversion convenience to convert a string ballot to an int ballot.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique identifier for the Ballot
        votes_string - The array of information in string format.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Returns:
        id The id of the Ballot

      • getVotes

        public int[] getVotes()
        Returns:
        votes: The integer array holding the Ballot information/rank information.

      • getCurRound

        public int getCurRound()
        Returns:
        curRound: The current round of the IR runoff election.

      • setCurRound

        public void setCurRound(int curRound)
        Updates the Ballot to the current round of the instant runoff election.
        Parameters:
        curRound - The new round of the runoff election.
